ai-tha-ap83:0.3_0: I declare this to the senior by speaking,
ai-tha-ap83:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
ai-tha-ap83:2.1_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-tha-ap83:2.3_0: they’ll cross over the far shore,
ai-tha-ap83:4.2_0: the great hermit went to the great hermit.
ai-tha-ap83:4.3_0: I’ll grab you by the flower
ai-tha-ap83:5.1_0: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady,
ai-tha-ap83:5.3_0: I paid homage at the teacher’s feet,
ai-tha-ap83:6.4_0: I fell to the ground right there.
ai-tha-ap83:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap83:8.1_0: When it has been over six years,
ai-tha-ap83:9.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap83:9.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap83:9.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap83:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nimitta.
